name: Cauliflower "Mac and Cheese" Bake
author: Cracker Barrel
summary: Replace macaroni with cauliflower in our twist on a classic Mac and Cheese. Our imposter pasta is sure to become a new family favourite.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups CRACKER BARREL Shredded Double Cheddar Cheese, divided
⅓ cup KRAFT 100% Parmesan Aged Grated Cheese, divided
directions: Heat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Cook cauliflower in boiling water in large saucepan 4 minutes; drain well
margarine in large saucepan on medium heat
Add onions; cook and stir 3 minutes or until crisp-tender
Stir in flour and mustard; cook and stir 1 minute
Whisk in milk; cook 5 minutes or until thickened, stirring frequently
Parmesan; stir until Cheddar is melted
Add cauliflower; stir to evenly coat
5-L casserole dish sprayed with cooking spray
Microwave remaining margarine in medium microwaveable bowl on HIGH 30 sec
Stir in bread crumbs and remaining Parmesan; sprinkle over cauliflower mixture
Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until heated through, topping with remaining Cheddar for the last 5 minutes
